content:
Hi everyone :) I'm a Japanese. I love rustlang. These days, I contribute to diesel and rust-clippy. I’m planning on contributing to rustdoc. I want to become a member of the rust-lang organization in the future.

I'm looking forward to chatting with you all :)
That's awesome! I'm happy to help with getting started on rustdoc :) did you have anything specific in mind or just looking for a good first issue?

Joshua Nelson said:

That's awesome! I'm happy to help with getting started on rustdoc :) did you have anything specific in mind or just looking for a good first issue?

Thank you! I am just looking for a good first issue! Do you have any issues to recommend?
hmm, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/82042 might be a good first issue
it just needs HTML changes I think
or if you want something that doesn't involve dealing with the frontend, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/81893

Joshua Nelson said:

hmm, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/82042 might be a good first issue

Thank you.
I'm going to work on both of them!
feel free to ask questions in #rustdoc :)
